title: How to make your portfolio reflect your values
contentencoded:
If money is power, then one place we have the most power is how we invest our savings. This is part of a larger movement called values investing. Amy Domini, founder and CEO of Domini Social Investments has long championed this movement. She discusses how to make your portfolio reflect your values with Marketplace Morning Report host David Brancaccio. Click the audio player above to listen.

On Monday we heard from the CEO of a company that lends its seal of approval to stocks and other investments that comply with Islamic teaching. For instance, a company that makes a lot of money from gambling, or the sale of alcohol, or charging interest wouldn’t make the cut.
